document.docAuthor: Cadle, John E. & Savage, Jay M.
document.masterDocTitle: Systematics of the Dendrophidion nuchale complex (Serpentes: Colubridae) with the description of a new species from Central America

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Systematics of the Dendrophidion nuchale complex (Serpentes: Colubridae) with the description of a new species from Central America

subSubSection.paragraph:
COSTA RICA
:
LIMÓN :
Guayacán [
10 °02’ 22 ” N
,
83 ° 32 ’ 40 ” W
; photograph by Brian Kubicki,
Fig. 22
B]. Río Blanco, Liverpool [about
09° 59 ’ N
,
83 ° 09’ W
; photograph by Andrés Vega, posted on the InBio web gallery (http://www.inbio.ac.cr/)].
LIMÓN /CARTAGO:
Parque Nacional Barbilla [
10 °06’09” N
,
83 ° 28 ’03” W
] [sight record by Gerardo Cháves of an individual with a green anterior body and black nuchal collar]. PUNTARENAS: Cajón, 80 m [
08° 56 ' 30 " N
,
83 ° 20 ' W
], UCR 7235, 7414 , 7421 (photograph of UCR 7421 in Savage 2002 : pl. 415 ). Finca Las Cruces [now the Las Cruces Biological Station], 6.4 km S San Vito de Java, 1100–1220 m [
08° 47 ’ 35 ” N
,
82 ° 57 ’ 30 ” W
], LACM 148553 – 56 . Finca Helechales, 1050 m [about 12–15 km NE Potrero Grande; 09°04’N ,
83 °05’ W
], LSUMZ 11636 . Between Lagarto and Quebrada Disciplina, 75 m [approximately
08° 57 ' N
,
83 ° 19 ' W
], UCR 6293 . Trail to Cerro Seno (near Potrero Grande), 1800 m [ 09° 01' 04" N ,
83 ° 10 ' 26 " W
],
UCR 20373
. Upper San Luís Valley, 1000 m [
10 ° 17 ’ N
,
84 ° 47 ’ W
], LACM 148557 .
SAN JOSÉ :
Puriscal area, western edge of the Meseta Central, 900–1000 m (
09° 50 ’ N
,
84 ° 19 ’ W
; sight record of Alejandro Solórzano of a
Dendrophidion
with a green anterior body and black collar).

PANAMA : BOCAS
DEL
TORO :
Chiriquí Grande road, 396 m [approximately
08° 56 ’ 50 ” N
,
82 ° 12 ’ 45 ” W
], USNM 347917 . Río Changuinola at boca del Río Culubre, 109–259 m , 8230 ’ N,
9 °09’ W
, CH 6547 (we examined a photograph of the live specimen taken by Matt Miller provided to us by Cesar Jaramillo.
[ BOCAS
DEL
TORO ]:
Boquete Trail, 1500 ft . [ 457 m ; approximately
08° 50 ' N
,
82 ° 11 ' 30 " W
along a trail between Guarumo and La Loma], MCZ R- 22210 .
COCLÉ :
Omar Torrijos Herrera National Park, 800 m (photograph of a live specimen by Roberto Brenes). El Copé de La Pintada, about
08° 40 ’ N
,
80 ° 37 ’ W
(photograph of a live specimen by Julie Ray).).
[ COCLÉ ]:
El Valle del Antón [
08° 37 ’ N
,
80 °08’ W
], MCZ R- 34878 ( holotype ). DARIÉN: Cerro Pirri, 3 1 / 2 hr walk From Pirri marker, 1300 m [
07° 56 ’ N
,
77 ° 43 ’ W
], UMMZ 148005 . Cerro Pirri, 1450 m [
07° 56 ’ N
,
77 ° 43 ’ W
], UMMZ 155724 . NE slope Cerro Sapo, headwaters Río San Antonio, above Quebrada de Dos Bocas, 90–190 m [
07° 58 ’ N
,
78 ° 22 ’ W
; see Myers 1969 : 12–18 ],
KU
110292
. Mt. Sapo [= Cerro Sapo;
07° 58 ’ N
,
78 ° 22 ’ W
], ANSP 22967 (head only). Laguna [ 820 m ; 08°04’ N ,
77 ° 19 ’ W
(Fairchild & Handley 1966 )], KU 75681 . [DARIÉN]: “foreste del Río Cianati” (Peracca 1896 : 5 , “
Drymobius dendrophis
”) [
Dendrophidion clarkii
is suggested by a single anal plate and 148 subcaudals. Río Cianati is a “small river flowing west of Punta de Sabana and flowing southward into Golfo de San Miguel, approximately
08° 30 ’ N
,
78 ° 10 ’ W
(Selander & Vaurie 1962 : 49 )].
PANAMÁ :
Cerro Azul region (Cerro Jefe region, Piedras-Pacora ridge),
9 ° 14 ’ N
,
79 ° 23 ’ W
, AMNH R- 119877 . Cerro Campana, 800 m [
08° 41 ’ N
,
79 ° 55 ’ W
], AMNH R- 129758 .
[ PANAMÁ ]:
Playa Grande-Tres Hermanas Ridge, 1800 ft [ 549 m ; approximately
09° 25 ’ N
,
79 ° 23 ’ W
; a ridge separating Quebradas Playa Grande and Tres Hermanas, part of the Río Esperanza system; see Dunn & Bailey 1939 : 4 ; Cadle & Myers 2003 : 15–17 ; Ibáñez et al. “ 1994 ” ( 1995 )], MCZ R- 42760 .
SAN BLAS :
Armila [about 50 m ;
08° 40 ’ N
,
77 ° 28 ’ W
], USNM
150138
.

COLOMBIA :
No other data, USNM , 267275 .? Magdalena Valley [questionable record; see text], MCZ R- 22002 .
CAUCA :
Quebrada Guanguí, 0.5 km above Río Patia (upper Saija drainage), 100–200 m [about
02° 50 ’ N
,
77 ° 25 ’ W
; Myers 1991 : 8 ], AMNH R- 109718 - 21 .

,

,
77 °00’ W

,

,
76 °02’ W

VALLE
DEL
CAUCA :

,
76 ° 47 ’04” W

77 °08’ W
